name: Planetary Defense Duel
description:
Defend your planet! In this arcade-style space shooter, two players must try to destroy one another's ship, with the occasional help of three items. Strike your opponent's ship to win!

All programming, design, sound, and sprites made by Natalie Hill using the Godot engine over 4 weeks, with assets made in GIMP and LMMS.

Multiplayer only. Gamepad recommended. Download includes Windows, Mac, and Linux builds.
